Content: We are spending a week and a half exploring the beaches, tide pools and nature reserves. We also learned how to surf! This is our last hurrah before heading home after a great year of travel.
Articles: [{"id":5864,"title":"The Uneventful Week in Costa Rica That Wasn't","created":"2023-07-13 12:01:31","url":"https://slowcamino.com/travel-destinations/countries/costa-rica/the-uneventful-week-in-costa-rica-that-wasnt/","excerpt":"We expected the final week of our family gap year — in a small Costa Rican beach town — to be simple and uneventful. It was anything but."}]
